entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse So says the guy who put America in Recession with 36 million unemployed as a result his failure  to quickly and effectively deal with Covid19! Trump plays golf and holds rallies into March after warnings on Covid 19 in January! Now we have over 93000 Americans dead! You were weak
